statements: DELETE FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE project_id = 101 AND expense_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_date < '2022-01-01' AND project_name = 'Vintage Mustang';
DELETE FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1001 AND end_date < '2020-12-31';
DELETE FROM Expense WHERE category = 'Travel' AND cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM PartsInventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND part_price > 100;
DELETE FROM labor WHERE project_id = 123 AND worker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 3 AND expense_type = 'Material';
